name: Cream Cheese Mints
author: diane
summary: These seem to be everyone's favorite holiday candy recipe. Could be the melt in your mouth texture, or perhaps the sweet peppermint taste. Could also be the fact that this is the easiest candy recipe around! If stored in airtight container, these can be frozen for a couple months. These can also be made into pretty shapes by rolling in granulated sugar, pressing into candy molds, and dropping them out.
ingredients: 1 drop any color food coloring paste
directions: In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, butter, and confectioner's sugar
Color as desired with food coloring paste, or leave white
Roll mixture into small balls, and place on waxed paper
Flatten with a fork dipped in confectioners' sugar
Let dry for about 2 hours on waxed paper, then freeze or refrigerate
